short_summary: The request for standing offers (RFSO) is for the acquisition of halal meat products including delivery to 3 regions: Montreal, Quebec and La Macaza as detailed in Annex A. The solicitation will result in a standing offer for 100 % of the required quantity for a period of two years.
description: The Procurement Entity issues this Request for Standing Offers (RFSO)for the acquisition of halal meat products including delivery to three regions: the procurements will call for bids for a 24 compensation in the event of restitution for delivery services not performed in terms of quality. Annex A is part of the tender documents and details the delivery areas, quantities, and qualifies required. The document outlines the conditions for delivery, packaging, and labelling necessary to ensure compliance over 50% reimbursement for the reimbursement of delivery costs and related labelling costs, and 10% of the contract value for equipment costs associated with performing the delivery services. The solicitation will result in a standing offer for 100 % of the required quantity for a period of two years.
